title: HeadlessChat Visual Polish
description: Make the HeadlessChat UI look polished and match the design references

requirements.item: Message avatars - circular icons with U/C initials
Edit diff with line numbers column
Todo list with circular checkboxes (not emoji)
Read tool shows line count '(27 lines)'
Token count display 'Tokens: X in, Y out'

acceptanceCriteria.item: UI matches design-reference images in imgs/
All visual elements are polished with hover states
